column5: Can anyone recommend a good GMRS radio with decent range and reliability at a fair price?  Thanks, Burt
I bought the 43 Kilometers Motorola's and I'm lucky to get 1 mile  , if that's any help.

Darn things seem absolutely useless unless you have a near perfect line of sight or a signal line not broken by trees, structures or hills. Even the the so called 40 km ones are useless in dense bush a 2 km.

Yeah I know they get nowhere near the advertised range. This will be for amusement parks like Wonderland and Disney.  I had a set of Cobra's but the neighbours kid smacked one off the pavement....  Burt
